channel.title: Help with weapon animation... ^^
channel.description: Hey, I am using a source called PwnScape, and when i hold a godsword it is held vertically, not horizontally like a 2H... I've been told that it is in client.java and under 'getWepAnim'. I've tried that, and the ID for any godsword was not there, so i added one, and copied that exact same thing from a D2H, just changed the wepon ID. But nothing different happened, i still hold it vertically, please help >.<

item.title: Help with weapon animation... ^^
item.dc:creator: @Vice117 Vice117
item.description:
@Vice117 wrote:

Hey, I am using a source called PwnScape, and when i hold a godsword it is held vertically, not horizontally like a 2H… I’ve been told that it is in client.java and under ‘getWepAnim’. I’ve tried that, and the ID for any godsword was not there, so i added one, and copied that exact same thing from a D2H, just changed the wepon ID. But nothing different happened, i still hold it vertically, please help >.<

Read full topic
